attributes.action: If Stormont fails then monies and expenses to MLA’s & staff should stop.
attributes.additional_details: It is unfair on the population that these people fail and still get paid for their failure whilst the people suffering because of the failure have to earn considerably less and endure hardship caused by these impotent and inflexible political officials.  If a common man or women refused to do their jobs they would not receive any benefits so these people should also not receive anything.  No work No Pay.
attributes.background: If the two main parties once more bring devolution to a stand still then all payments of wages and expenses to all Elected departmental Ministers, MLA’s and then their SpAds, Constituency Offices and Staff should cease immediately on the day of closure

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about the prospect of the Northern Ireland Assembly not being able to meet, but it's not clear in exactly what circumstances you want pay and expenses for MLAs to cease.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly in what circumstances you want pay and expenses for MLAs to cease.
